title: Opinions on the Singed Support Main (Smite, No Sightstone)
body: Riot wanting to ban a player for playing their own way. I'm sorry. Is this LCS or Flex Queue. Get your fucking head out of your arse Rito.   You stupid morons already slowly ruining your own game, don't try and ruin this guys probably very well thought out way to play, you own it, don't control people.

replies.body:
If anything, Seras addressed this issue best with their response to someone who was concerned about being banned for using the strategy with their teams consent, so I'm just going to give you a link to that and hopefully it will help you better understand why that singed player was actually banned.
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/WRN3RIzk-game-rules?comment=0000

This is stupid Riot form.

Hey if i want, can I still play Heimerdinger support and not get banned since he is listed as his second role?

Riot seriously need to review this policy.

You seem to be confusing "role" with "position".

A champions "role" is what they are defined as by Riot, and is one (or two) of: Assassin, Tank, Fighter, Mage, Support, Marksman. Roles are not defined by the META.

A "position" is where and how a player might use a champion during the laning phase of a match, and is one of: Top, Mid, ADC, Support and Jungle. Positions are directly defined by the META.

If you want to play Heimerdinger in the Support position (without the possibility of being banned), you will need to cooperate with your teams so that everyone can agree on the strategy you are using. After all, this is a *team* game.
